title: Tim Unboxes and Beats Game & Watch Super Mario Bros. On First Try
description:
Tim Gettys unboxes and plays with the Game & Watch Super Mario Bros. He is very ashamed of his worst Super Mario Bros. run in years.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1


Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys i'm tim gettys and i am back with another unboxing this time nintendo has sent us the game and watch super mario brothers 35th anniversary celebration this is very very cool okay already i wasn't expecting to get this so i'm pretty excited to actually take a crack at it here it is a in the style of a classic nintendo game and watch but it allows you to play super mario brothers 1. super mario brothers lost levels which is mario brothers two in japan and um it can work as an alarm clock and also you get to play the game and watch classic ball um let's get right into it okay slide it out oh wait a minute that's pretty cool pretty fancy we got the back of the box there you can see the four different things i was talking about that you can do with this all right let's get let's get into this usbc charging cable i also i just love that you know playstation 5 is launching xbox series x and here's nintendo we're bringing back the gaming watch not much in this box but i guess

get into this usbc charging cable i also i just love that you know playstation 5 is launching xbox series x and here's nintendo we're bringing back the gaming watch not much in this box but i guess there doesn't need to be oh look at that game and watch super mario brothers super mario brothers one of my favorite games of all time so i'm pretty pretty excited to get right in here power on the side oh oh the screen looks really nice that's pretty cool oh you can change the different backgrounds you hit game and then you're allowed to to go down to super mario bros mario brothers 2 or ball i like that they're calling just straight up super mario brothers 2. they're not even calling it lost levels no we know what this is i'm pretty sure none of that's real you're not real man i gotta play super mario brothers can i beat super mario brothers in my first try right now live while i'm doing this we'll have to see let's get into it oh it's little well it's really weird oh it's hard to get

super mario brothers can i beat super mario brothers in my first try right now live while i'm doing this we'll have to see let's get into it oh it's little well it's really weird oh it's hard to get this right the buttons feel they're really close this classic this is how gaming watch used to be but now with this beautiful screen though these beautiful colors this is a nifty little device though all right guys we're getting real dicey here we're about to get to 8-3 i'm gonna have to get one of the fire flowers from the two sets of hammer brothers not the easiest but at least i'm big here oh no oh no okay good okay good there's one part that can really mess you up here and it's when there's the flying fish and they can hit you make you little and then you're you're kind of screwed see that's the hammer brother i'm talking about now i just need to not get hit by this lava and boom let's go bowser let's go you ain't got enough you ain't got enough what is this [Music] was that the worst

the hammer brother i'm talking about now i just need to not get hit by this lava and boom let's go bowser let's go you ain't got enough you ain't got enough what is this [Music] was that the worst performance i've had in the last 20 years of my life playing super mario brothers yeah it was but you boys still got it this is a fun little thing a fun little commemorative thing for mario's 35th anniversary i'm sure we're going to be doing a lot more coverage of mario stuff here on youtube.com kind of funny games including uh mario 3d world coming out i think in february very exciting stuff until next time love you guys bye
